ProductInfo.Features:
4 Channel H.264 compression triplex real time CIF/HD1/D1 picture resolution industrial DVR, with 1500GB hard drive
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation
Support daylight saving time, PIP and EZOOM function, live video, parameter setting and copy playback video via network
4 of Color CCD DSP CCTV security cameras 3.6mm wide view lens 420TVL 20 IR leds for night vision
Package included: digital video recorder, 1500GB hard drive, DVR remote control, user manual and software CD, USB mouse, 4 color CCD dome cameras, 4 camera power supplies, 4 camera extension cables
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Channel H.264 Real Time Network Embeded DVR CCTV Security Camera System, Stand Alone Digital Video Recorder DVR System with 1500GB 3.5" SATA HDD Hard Drive, Camera Power Supplies, 4 CCD Outdoor Night Vision 420L Wide View Angle Security Cameras, 4 of 50 Feet Camera Video Cables WB6
